name: edgar_company_facts
description: Retrieve all structured financial facts and XBRL data reported by a company across all filings

cik.description: Central Index Key (CIK) - 10 digit identifier or shorter format

facts_count.description: Number of distinct XBRL facts/concepts available

facts.description: Complete financial facts organized by taxonomy, containing all reported XBRL concepts with historical values

additionalProperties.description: Facts for specific taxonomy with all concepts and their time series data

metadata.author: Ashutosh Sinha
metadata.note: Returns ALL structured financial data from XBRL filings. Includes income statement, balance sheet, cash flow, and custom metrics. Large response size (can be several MB).
warnings: Response can be very large (multiple MB)
Consider using edgar_company_concept for specific metrics
Parse response carefully due to size
